ruby
  metasploit-framework: World's most used penetration testing software http://www.metasploit.com/
  childprocess:         a simple and reliable solution for controlling external programs running in the background on any Ruby / OS combination.   https://github.com/jarib/childprocess 
  concurrent-ruby:      Modern concurrency tools including agents, futures, promises, thread pools, supervisors, and more,  https://github.com/ruby-concurrency/concurrent-ruby
  rubyXL:               reading files produced by MS Excel, making minor modifications to them and saving them to be opened again, https://github.com/weshatheleopard/rubyXL
  roo:                  Roo provides an interface to spreadsheets of several sorts. https://github.com/roo-rb/roo.git
  axlsx:                excel generator https://github.com/randym/axlsx.git
  logstash              https://github.com/elastic/logstash
  phobos(simplifying kafka for ruby apps) https://github.com/klarna/phobos
